review: I bought this Chromecast thinking i could play my downloaded movies and view my pictures and home movies. You are not able to play downloads movies but can stream thru netflix. I also can not view my home movies or pictures directly from my phone but can thru google+. I also have to broadcast my SSID, this will not work if you don't. I even got it set up and working then stopped broadcasting like others mentioned in comments but it will stop working. I can use my laptop with the chromecast plug in installed in Chrome and view web pages but not able to do that from my phone, at least i haven't figure out how yet. Youtube is supported and can easily view from laptop or phone. Since i don't have a netflix subscription i only use this when viewing pictures or i want to look at websites on a bigger screen. Would be nice if the software would be updated so i can stop broadcasting my SSID.
author: Mike
